message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SE 

This paper deals with security and privacy issues related to location-based services, which are typically addressed in the computer security (cs.CR) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper proposes a decentralized proof-of-location scheme, which involves distributed computing (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) based on blockchain technology. Finally, the paper also discusses the implementation and evaluation of the proposed scheme, which falls under the software engineering (cs.SE) sub-category.
